data.comment: The big names in today's match at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir have now been confirmed.
The match is underway at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
In the minute 5, Eric Wattellier signals a Lorient throw-in in Rennes's half.
Throw-in Rennes.
Throw-in for Rennes in their own half.
In the minute 9, Can Lorient get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rennes's half?
Corner awarded to Lorient.
Eric Wattellier awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 11, Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Lorient.
Lorient have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Rennes in the half of Lorient.
In the minute 19, Rennes apply pressure and a brilliant heading opportunity is created for Adrien Hunou but the ball hits the post!
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Rennes close to the penalty box.
Damien Da Silva is on target to give Rennes a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 27, Rennes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Rennes in their own half.
In Lorient a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 41, Yoane Wissa (Lorient) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Rennes goal kick.
Throw-in for Rennes in the half of Lorient.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
The second-half has started.
In Lorient, Hamari Traore of Rennes is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 48, Faitout Maouassa (Rennes) gets a yellow card.
Trevoh Chalobah (Lorient) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Rennes at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
In the minute 50, Free kick Rennes.
Free kick for Rennes in the half of Lorient.
The home team replace Pierre-Yves Hamel with Terem Moffi.
In the minute 53, It's a goal kick for the home team in Lorient.
Throw-in for Lorient at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
Rennes to take a throw-in in Lorient territory.
In the minute 58, Rennes have a goal kick.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Rennes in their own half.
Eric Wattellier awards Lorient a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Can Lorient capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rennes's half?
Eric Wattellier awards Rennes a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 66, Adrien Truffert (Rennes) has received a yellow card from Eric Wattellier.
Goal! Benjamin Bourigeaud extends Rennes's lead to 0-2.
Jeremy Doku instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 71, The away team have replaced Adrien Truffert with Martin Terrier. This is the first substitution made today by Julien Stephan.
Julien Stephan (Rennes) is making a second substitution, with Clement Grenier replacing Eduardo Camavinga.
Rennes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 73, Thomas Monconduit is replacing Fabien Lemoine for the home team.
Quentin Boisgard is replacing Enzo Le Fee for Lorient at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
Jonathan Delaplace is booked for the home team.
In the minute 76, In Lorient Rennes attack through Clement Grenier. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Lorient at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
It's now 0-3 in Lorient as Martin Terrier scores for Rennes.
In the minute 77, Ball safe as Rennes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rennes's Clement Grenier is on target but unsuccessful.
Lorient make their fourth substitution with Adrian Grbic replacing Vincent Le Goff.
In the minute 81, Christophe Pelissier is making the team's fifth substitution at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir with Sylvain Marveaux replacing Armand Lauriente.
Mbaye Niang is on a sub for Adrien Hunou for Rennes.
James Lea Siliki is replacing Steven Nzonzi for Rennes at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
In the minute 82, Important block from the Lorient defence as Martin Terrier fires in a strike for Rennes.
Rennes have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
Lorient's Terem Moffi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 83, Rennes have a goal kick.
Jonathan Delaplace of Lorient gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lorient.
In the minute 86, Rennes have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
Ball goes out of play for a Lorient goal kick.
Julien Stephan (Rennes) is making a fifth substitution, with Dalbert replacing Faitout Maouassa.
In the minute 87, Rennes have a goal kick.
Jeremy Doku for Rennes gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Lorient goal kick.
In Lorient a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Rennes drives forward and Jeremy Doku gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
It's 0-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
